ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Line emission from relativistic accretion disk. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A line emission from a relativistic accretion disk. See Fabian et al., MNRAS 238, 729.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: power law depend. of emissivity. If this parameter is 10 or greater, then the accretion disk emissivity law (1-sqrt(6/R))/R^3 is used. Otherwise, the emissivity scales as R^Betor10 .

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
